text:
I'm a joint degree student
at the Harvard Kennedy

School of Government and
the Harvard Business School,

and each campus is connected
via the bridge over the Charles

And when I think about
my life's purpose,

I hope to serve as a
bridge that both connects

the public and private sectors,
but also as a bridge that

can speak for the voices that
are often not at the table

when making decisions that
affect everyday lives.

So I think the intersectionality
of business and government

has an incredible opportunity
to change the lives of so many,

And I hope that I can
continue to live a life where

I'm serving people from the
boardroom, and the classroom,

and beyond, so that I can ensure
that my life's work is shown

in the legacy that I leave for
the people that come after me,

and the people that are
alive and living currently.
